description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Cutlets With Charred Zucchini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,Zucchini,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Lamb Cutlets With Charred Zucchini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup dark brown sugar, firmly packed
3 large zucchini, trimmed, cut into ribbons (or thinly sliced lengthways)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cola, marmalade, tomato sauce, sugar, maple syrup, mustard, onion and garlic in a glass or ceramic dish. Season. Add cutlets and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight if time permits.

Heat barbecue grill on medium. Whisk oil, vinegar and honey in a jug to combine. Spray zucchini with oil. Grill for 1 minute each side or until charred. Transfer to plate. Drizzle with dressing. Top with feta, mint and arils.
Transfer marinade to a small pan over medium heat. Simmer for 3 minutes or until thickened slightly.
Meanwhile, grill lamb cutlets until cooked to your liking. Serve with the sauce and salad.
